channel.title: Materials on Analyst
channel.description: Recent content in Materials on Analyst

item.title: Intrusion Detection Systems
item.description: Firewalls Firewalls monitor access from the outside network to the inside network. Traffic originating from inside the network would not pass through the firewall.

item.title: Intrusion Detection Systems
item.description: Host-based IDS look for local system configurations and behaviour, while network-based IDS look for network connections and looks for anomalies and common signatures.

item.title: Distributed Systems Security
item.description: This one was written during my preparation to the GCFA exam and is also essential for my CISSP certification preparation.

item.title: Phishing
item.description: Phishing, aka brand spoofing, aka carding - various scam that primarily use e-mail messages to trick a person into divulging personal information.

item.title: Point of Sale Breack
item.description: The main purpose is to steal the 16-digit card number ðŸ’³. Restraunts, retail, frocey are the most affected.
